ability.name: And For My Next Trick
ability.description: * Take 1 Corruption Point to activate And For My Next Trick. * Treat a card in your hand as a Magician for the rest of combat. * When you cast a spell that you have not yet cast this combat: * Draw 5 cards.
ability.flavor: All of the knowledge in the world is at your fingertips, if you're willing to pay the price.
